eric.camera.canon

Class CanonCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • eric.camera.canon.CanonCamera

  • public class CanonCamera
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String autoExposureMode
      The auto exposure returns values: "P", "TV", "AV", "Manual", "Bulb"

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CanonCamera()
      Get auto exposure mode settings and verify "gphoto2" program exists.
      CanonCamera(boolean verbose)
      Get auto exposure mode setting, verify the "gphoto2" program exists, and set verbose flag.

    • Field Detail

      • autoExposureMode

        public java.lang.String autoExposureMode
        The auto exposure returns values: "P", "TV", "AV", "Manual", "Bulb"

    • Constructor Detail

      • CanonCamera

        public CanonCamera(boolean verbose)
        Get auto exposure mode setting, verify the "gphoto2" program exists, and set verbose flag.
        Parameters:
        verbose - Verbose flag (true,false)

      • CanonCamera

        public CanonCamera()
        Get auto exposure mode settings and verify "gphoto2" program exists.

    • Method Detail

      • image

        public void image()
        Take an image observation on the Canon camera. Be sure to use the CanonCamera.waitFor() method to wait for image command to complete

      • imageSequence

        public void imageSequence(int numberFrames,
                          int timeInterval)
        Take a set of image observations separated by a time interval. Use the CanonCamera.waitFor() method to wait for end of image command.
        Parameters:
        numberFrames - Number of image frames to acquire
        timeInterval - Time in seconds between observations. Be sure to leave sufficient time for long exposures.

      • waitFor

        public void waitFor()
        Wait for the image or image sequence to complete before continuing.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Kill the RunTime connection.

      • setShutterSpeed

        public void setShutterSpeed(java.lang.String shutterSpeed)
        Set the shutter speed for the Canon camera. The shutter speed can only be set for auto exposure modes "TV" and "Manual".
        Parameters:
        shutterSpeed - Options: "0", "25", "20", "15", "13", "10", "8", "6", "5", "4", "3.2", "2.5", "2", "1.6", "1.3", "1", "0.8", "0.6", "0.5", "0.4", "0.3", "1/4", "1/5", "1/6", "1/8", "1/10", "1/13", "1/15", "1/20", "1/25", "1/30", "1/40", "1/50", "1/60", "1/80", "1/100", "1/125", "1/160", "1/200", "1/250", "1/320", "1/400", "1/500", "1/640", "1/800", "1/1000", "1/1250", "1/1600", "1/2000", "1/2500", "1/3200", "1/4000", "1/5000", "1/6400", "1/8000"

      • setAperture

        public void setAperture(java.lang.String aperture)
        Set the aperture for the Canon camera. The aperture can be set for "Manual" and "TV" auto exposure modes.
        Parameters:
        aperture - Options: "1.8", "2", "2.2", "2.5", "2.8", "3.2", "3.5", "4", "4.5", "5", "5.6", "6.3", "7.1", "8", "9", "10", "11", "13", "14", "16", "18", "20", "22"

      • setExposureCompensation

        public void setExposureCompensation(java.lang.String exposureCompensation)
        Set the exposure compensation for the Canon camera. The exposure compensation can be set for the "TV" and "AV" auto exposure modes.
        Parameters:
        exposureCompensation - Options: "-5", "-4.6", "-4.3", "-4", "-3.6", "-3.3", "-3", "-2.6", "-2.3", "-2" ,"-1.6", "-1.3", "-1.0", "-0.6", "-0.3", "0", "0.3", "0.6", "1.0", "1.3", "1.6", "2", "2.3", "2.6", "3", "3.3", "3.6", "4", "4.3", "4.6", "5"

      • setISO

        public void setISO(java.lang.String iso)
        Set the ISO for the Canon camera.
        Parameters:
        iso - Options: "100", "200", "400", "800", "1600", "3200", "6400"

      • setMeteringMode

        public void setMeteringMode(java.lang.String meteringMode)
        Set the Metering Mode for the Canon camera
        Parameters:
        meteringMode - Options: "Evaluative", "Partial", "Spot"

      • setWhiteBalance

        public void setWhiteBalance(java.lang.String whiteBalance)
        Set the white balance value for the Canon camera
        Parameters:
        whiteBalance - Options: "Auto", "Daylight", "Shadow", "Cloudy", "Tungsten", "Fluorescent", "Flash", "Manual"
